client_profile_higher_education_0_univer: Åbo Akademi University School of Economics
client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Salo Turunen Peltola on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Salo Turunen Peltola is a 29 year old and comes from Finland.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Salo Turunen Peltola has been happily married to Emilia since 2024. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2015, Salo finished his secondary school education at Ilomantsin lukio.
Salo pursued higher education at Åbo Akademi University School of Economics, graduating in 2018.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Salo Turunen Peltola is a 29 year old Financial Advisor from Finland.
Salo Turunen Peltola's first role was as a Financial Advisor at Danske Bank Wealth Management, where he worked diligently from 2019 till now to establish a strong reputation.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 30000 EUR.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1850000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Oil and Gas Executive, in 2017.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
